projects.name: Movie Streaming App
projects.min_desc: A streaming platform for movies and TV shows
projects.description: Feature-rich movie streaming app with advanced search, watchlists, multi-language support & Firebase auth

projects.name: Car Rental
projects.description: A car rental application that allows users to browse and rent cars. It includes features like filtering cars by type, viewing car details, and managing rentals.

projects.name: FinBiz Financial Dashboard
projects.description: FinBiz is a React-based financial dashboard featuring interactive charts (Chart.js), smooth animations (AOS), and responsive styling (Tailwind CSS) for an optimized UI/UX.

projects.name: Mosnad Platform
projects.min_desc: Mosnad Platform bridges the gap between Yemeni talents and employers, empowering individuals to grow in their careers while supporting companies in hiring qualified talent through a trusted and streamlined process
projects.description: A training platform that connects companies and employees with a comprehensive dashboard. Highlights the platform's value through company logos and key features.

projects.name: Twitter App
projects.min_desc: Full-stack web application mimicking Twitter core functionalities
projects.description: An integrated web application designed to simulate the basic functionality of the popular social media platform Twitter with features like posting tweets, liking, and commenting.

projects.name: Pixel Positions Job Application Site
projects.description: Pixel Positions Job Application Site! An advanced Job Application platform built with Laravel. powered by modern front-end tools, and enhanced for optimal user experience. This platform streamlines the process of job posting, searching, and application management. Allows employers to post job openings and users to explore various job opportunities. Built with Laravel, this site offers a user-friendly interface and seamless user experience for job seekers and employers alike.

projects.name: Biccas Landing Site
projects.description: Biccas is a modern front-end landing page for a productivity tool, featuring a clean layout and intuitive navigation. It highlights the platform's value through customer logos, essential features, and clear benefits, enhancing user experience and engagement.Biccas is a responsive front-end web page designed according to a Figma design. This project showcases a modern and professional user interface aimed at improving productivity through a variety of features. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, Biccas serves as a landing page for a productivity tool with a sleek design and user-friendly navigation.
